about_the_game:
Locomotion is a Action, Platformer Game Inspired by many other Games out there. This game has a fascinating story behind it! Play it to find out what secrets the Acidic Waters have for you!
You play as a crash test dummy, and the people who made you need to test your strength.

  • OS: Windows 10
